He raises a brow of concentration as =

udio sensors become his visuals, as he processes the information and moves =
according to the patterns of the sounds. Darkenss being the norm of his eve=
ry day life, Tucson was neither bothered or upset by it. Indeed if there wa=
s fun to be had, he was having a good time right now, doing the job that Au=
tobots were most famous for.

" Hah, playing dirty.. That's just putting it=
 mildly." 

He could hear that Nightstrike had gotten himself a weapon once=

up another six arrows in the cross bow. With a casual gate, he walks into t=

same time, his sonar systems were now coming up with positive visuals of wh=
o was inside. They translate the waves to heat readings thus turning them i=
nto thermal images, which his systems quickly find matches for. He sends a =

" I have a positive ID on the Hostiles i=
n question. First one detected, is identified as Nightstrike, who is appare=

ure on their characteristics but I do have them as being hostile. Again the=

of my findings. Normally I'm quite sure of things but there are alot more s=
ignals flooding my sonars than I can keep up with, these two just happened =
to be the two I zeroed in most of all."

His transmission is swift, and soo=
n delivers the data to Perseus. As soon as he transmits, he returns to focu=
sing on the job at hand. Stopping Nightstrike and Lamia. 

" Old junk.. Goo=
d one. You won't be saying that in a few astro seconds that's for sure."

Tucson grows tired of the charades that Nightstrike was playing. It was tim=
e to skunk him out completely. He moves into the same room as Nightstrike a=
nd Lamia, and uses his sonar equipment to scan the schematics of the room. =

ving door, which now slams shut, including others leading into and out of t=

ention that my sonar systems double as an identication module.. And Lamia, =
I know you're in here somewhere too.. "

Even though he had pinpointed them=
, Tucson fires no weapons and makes no moves to do any harm. As an Autobot =
he swore not to harm anyone unless they harmed him first. He keeps the door=
s shut and continues the period of isolation until at least one of them cam=
e out into the open. Not letting his guard down for one moment, he continue=
s to scan the room with sonar equipment and remains ready for anything.
